property.name: createIssueQuery
property.value: INSERT INTO pipeline.issue ( issue_id, issue_name, issue_text, issue_author, entity_id, entity_class, created_date, updated_date, issue_status, labels) VALUES ( :ISSUE_ID, :ISSUE_NAME, :ISSUE_TEXT, :ISSUE_AUTHOR, :ENTITY_ID, :ENTITY_CLASS, :CREATED_DATE, :UPDATED_DATE, :ISSUE_STATUS, :LABELS)

property.name: loadIssueByIdQuery
property.value: SELECT i.issue_id, i.issue_name, i.issue_text, i.issue_author, i.entity_id, i.entity_class, i.created_date, i.updated_date, i.issue_status, i.labels FROM pipeline.issue i WHERE i.issue_id = ?

property.name: loadAllIssuesForEntityQuery
property.value: SELECT i.issue_id, i.issue_name, i.issue_text, i.issue_author, i.entity_id, i.entity_class, i.created_date, i.updated_date, i.issue_status, i.labels FROM pipeline.issue i WHERE i.entity_id = ? and i.entity_class = ? ORDER BY i.issue_id

property.name: loadIssuesByAuthorQuery
property.value: SELECT i.issue_id, i.issue_name, i.issue_text, i.issue_author, i.entity_id, i.entity_class, i.created_date, i.updated_date, i.issue_status, i.labels FROM pipeline.issue i WHERE i.issue_author = ? ORDER BY i.issue_id LIMIT ? OFFSET ?

property.name: countIssuesByAuthorQuery
property.value: SELECT count(*) FROM pipeline.issue i WHERE i.issue_author = ?

property.name: updateIssueQuery
property.value: UPDATE pipeline.issue SET issue_name = :ISSUE_NAME, issue_text = :ISSUE_TEXT, entity_id = :ENTITY_ID, entity_class = :ENTITY_CLASS, updated_date = :UPDATED_DATE, issue_status = :ISSUE_STATUS, labels = :LABELS WHERE issue_id = :ISSUE_ID

property.name: deleteIssuesForEntityQuery
property.value: DELETE FROM pipeline.issue AS i WHERE i.entity_id = ? AND i.entity_class = ?
